title: That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report CAOPC24-007, dated June 3, 2024 of the Chief Administrative Officer as follows: That Blair Nelson be appointed as the Commissioner of Infrastructure, Planning & Growth Management for the City of Peterborough.
That By-law 24-036, Being a By-law to confirm the proceedings of the Council at its special meeting held on June 3, 2024, be approved.
That this meeting be adjourned at 8:45 p.m.
